verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take my heart, I lay it down newline At the feet of You who's crowned. newline And take my life, I'm letting go newline I lift it up to You who's throned

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And I will worship You, Lord newline Only You, Lord newline And I will bow down before You newline Only You, Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Take my fret, take my fear newline All I have i'm leaving here newline Be all my hopes, be all my dreams newline Be all my delights, be my everything.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And it's just You and me here now newline Only You and me here now
